param.name: trigger_name
param.value: Lack of available memory on server {HOST.NAME}

job.script:
#!/bin/bash
echo "------------------------------------------------------------" echo "Modify trigger in [$SCHEDULER_PARAM_ZABBIX_HOST]" echo "Disable target trigger is [$SCHEDULER_PARAM_TRIGGER_NAME]" echo "Enable Temporary trigger is [$SCHEDULER_PARAM_TRIGGER_COND]" echo "------------------------------------------------------------"
export JM_HOME="/home/scheduler/hyclops_jm" cd $JM_HOME
# escape[,] in trigger name and trigger cond because of fabric input params must be escaped [,] ESCAPED_TRIGGER_NAME=`echo "$SCHEDULER_PARAM_TRIGGER_NAME" | sed -e "s/,/\\\\\\\,/g"` ESCAPED_TRIGGER_COND=`echo "$SCHEDULER_PARAM_TRIGGER_COND" | sed -e "s/,/\\\\\\\,/g"`
# setting hostid registered in zabbix ZABBIX_HOSTID=`fab gethostid:"$SCHEDULER_PARAM_ZABBIX_HOST" | head -1` if [ -z "$ZABBIX_HOSTID" ]; then echo "[error] Zabbix host [$SCHEDULER_PARAM_ZABBIX_HOST] is not found error." exit 1 fi echo "[info] Success of getting Zabbix hostid. $SCHEDULER_PARAM_ZABBIX_HOST's zabbix hostid is $ZABBIX_HOSTID"
# setting triggerid disabled by this job SOURCE_TRIGGERID=`fab zbx_get_trigger_id:hostid=$ZABBIX_HOSTID,trigger_name="$ESCAPED_TRIGGER_NAME" | head -1` if [ -z "$SOURCE_TRIGGERID" ]; then echo "[error] Zabbix modify source trigger [$SCHEDULER_PARAM_TRIGGER_NAME] is not found error." exit 1 fi echo "[info] Success of getting Zabbix modify source triggerid $SOURCE_TRIGGERID."
# disable and adding triggers RET_VAL=`fab trigger_switch:"$ZABBIX_HOSTID","$ESCAPED_TRIGGER_NAME","$ESCAPED_TRIGGER_COND" | head -1`
if [ $RET_VAL -eq 1 ]; then echo "[error] Trigger switch process is failed. Please check the format of source trigger name and dest trigger condition." exit 1 fi
# setting triggerid adding by HyClops JM DEST_TRIGGERID=`fab zbx_get_trigger_id:hostid=$ZABBIX_HOSTID,trigger_name="Switched by HyClops_JobMonitoring($ESCAPED_TRIGGER_NAME)" | head -1`
# setting trigger id to JobScheduler's environment file if [ -z "$SCHEDULER_PARAM_SOURCE_TRIGGERID" ]; then echo "[info] SOURCE_TRIGGERID=$SOURCE_TRIGGERID" >> $SCHEDULER_RETURN_VALUES echo "[info] DEST_TRIGGERID=$DEST_TRIGGERID" >> $SCHEDULER_RETURN_VALUES else echo "[info] SOURCE_TRIGGERID=$SCHEDULER_PARAM_SOURCE_TRIGGERID $SOURCE_TRIGGERID" >> $SCHEDULER_RETURN_VALUES echo "[info] DEST_TRIGGERID=$SCHEDULER_PARAM_DEST_TRIGGERID $DEST_TRIGGERID" >> $SCHEDULER_RETURN_VALUES fi
echo "[info] Disabled trigger id is $SOURCE_TRIGGERID" echo "[info] Enabled trigger id is $DEST_TRIGGERID" echo "[info] Success of trigger switching."
